title: Is there any website where anyone can write articles? - Quora

response.answer_text: You have posted this question on a website where you can write a number of articles or answers on various questions or topics of your interest. One of the benefits that this website will provide, unlike others, is the proper appreciation and criticism of your work by a whole lot of talented people in a fair way. I guess, this will encourage you to keep moving ahead with your talent and skills. Just give it a try once. I bet, you won't regret. By the way, the website is called Quora and has the domain as http://quora.com.
